Desc.entry: A competitively priced paid-for service providing dedicated and friendly staff to carry out the following services: shopping for a one-off item or on a regular basis; help to use technology, from your microwave and mobile phone to getting internet access; help to get to wherever you want to go, in or around Sheffield, from your local post office or GP to a day-trip into Derbyshire; small DIY jobs (some jobs may be covered by our free handyperson service); help finding out about what's on in Sheffield; help with attending and participating in hobbies and interests and meeting people. Can give carers a break so that they can go out with peace of mind. This service is tailored to meet the needs of the individual via support planning. A registered charity and not-for-profit service. Self or any referral.
